comment.author: 70759816@N00
comment._content: I believe the "Bar Harbor Airport" is not actually in BarHarbor but on the mainland in Trenton, Maine.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
charlesstobbs: 

Thanks for the information about the airport location.  For now, we’re gathering the suggestions and corrections, but holding off on making changes until more comments come in.

comment.author: 16612979@N00
comment._content:
Actually During WWII there where two airports in Bar Harbor one was NAAS Bar Harbor which was located in trenton and Bar Harbor Municable my guess is that almost all of these were from Bar harbor Munc. the shots of the runways don't show the Dumby Arresting setup that was at NAAS bar Harbor. nor does it show any of the USN/RN-Fleet Air Arms buildings.

The hanger looks to be one of the old Wright Flying Services hangers that were torn down right after the War was over.
